buildSessionName() buildSessionNameSession SessionbuildSessionName
static buildSessionName (?string $path = null , ?string $host = null , ?string $port = null )[static]
Build the session name based on GLPI's folder path + full domain + port
Adding the full domain name prevent two GLPI instances on the same domain (e.g. test.domain and prod.domain) with identical folder's path (e.g. /var/www/glpi) to compete for the same cookie name
Adding the port prevent some conflicts when using docker
Paramètres
string | null$path
Default to GLPI_ROOT
string | null$host
Default to $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']
string | null$port
Default to $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT']
Renvoie
string An unique session name

changeActiveEntities() changeActiveEntitiesSession SessionchangeActiveEntities
static changeActiveEntities ( $ID = "all" , $is_recursive = false )[static]
Change active entity to the $ID one. Update glpiactiveentities session variable. Reload groups related to this entity.
Paramètres
integer | string$ID
ID of the new active entity ("all"=>load all possible entities) (default 'all')
boolean$is_recursive
Also display sub entities of the active entity? (false by default)
Renvoie
boolean true on success, false on failure

getNewIDORToken() getNewIDORTokenSession SessiongetNewIDORToken
static getNewIDORToken (string $itemtype = "" , array $add_params = [] )[static]
Get new IDOR token This token validates the itemtype used by an ajax request is the one asked by a dropdown. So, we avoid IDOR request where an attacker asks for an another itemtype than the originaly intended
Depuis
9.5.3
Paramètres
string$itemtype
array$add_params
more criteria to check validy of idor tokens
Renvoie
string

Validate that the page has a CSRF token in the POST data and that the token is legit/not expired. If the token is valid it will be removed from the list of valid tokens.

validateIDOR() validateIDORSession SessionvalidateIDOR
static validateIDOR (array $data = [] )[static]
Validate that the page has a IDOR token in the POST data and that the token is legit/not expired. Tokens are kept in session until their time is expired (by default 2h) to permits multiple ajax calls for a dropdown
Depuis
9.5.3
Paramètres
array$data
$_POST data
Renvoie
boolean

static writeClose ( )[static]
